questions.question: Which company recently adjusted its profit expectations for 2025 to a range of $590 million to $630 million?
questions.explanation: Parsons Corporation adjusted its profit expectations for 2025 to a range of $590 million to $630 million, down from the prior outlook of $640 million to $710 million.

questions.question: What is the value of the contract that Lockheed Martin secured in May 2025 for upgrading Multiple Launch Rocket Systems?
questions.explanation: Lockheed Martin secured a $214.4 million contract to upgrade Multiple Launch Rocket Systems to the M270A2 configuration in May 2025.

questions.question: Which company has seen a significant trading volume of $12.519 billion amid its defense sector expansion?
questions.explanation: Palantir Technologies has experienced significant trading volume of $12.519 billion due to its expansion in the defense sector and strong earnings.
questions.source: Palantir Technologies' trading volume and defense sector expansion
